page.title: 20Conclusion- rural Sowerby
page.content: About a dozen members of Sowerby Women's Institute have taken part in this survey, and have thoroughly enjoyed the experience. We have learned a lot about our local area, and now appreciate more fully the isolated existence of the people. On the whole, the population of the block is contented with its way of life, and visitors receive an extra warm welcome. The experience has also given our members an opportunity to use a computer for the first time, an experience not without its problems! These have, however, been largely overcome, with the net result of our contribution to the 1985 Domesday Project.
